DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , blind , placebo-controlled , crossover clinical trial evaluate efficacy 2-DeNT oral topical powder treatment recurrent aphthous stomatitis ( RAS ) . To include study , subject must minor RAS ulcer less 48 hour duration . It randomly determine powder use first ; subject use 2-DeNT powder placebo powder . Subjects apply powder twice daily maintain daily log record size ulcer , erythema score , level pain . The subject continue apply 2-DeNT powder ulcer resolve .
